refsect2.title: idmef_additional_data_write ()
refsect2.para: Write additional_data within msg message buffer. The buffer is associated with a prelude_io_t file descriptor where the data will be written.

entry.para: Pointer to a prelude_msgbuf_t object, where the message should be written.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: 0 on success, a negative value if an error occured.
